#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;


LL inline findminSum(LL *a,LL n){
	LL ms=0,ts=0;
	for(LL i=0;i<n;i++){
		ts+=a[i];
		if(ts>0){
			ts=0;
		}
		if(ms>ts){
			ms=ts;
		}
	}
	return ms;
}
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		LL n,s=0;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		LL a[n];
		for(LL i=0;i<n;i++){scanf("%lld",&a[i]);s+=a[i];}
		LL m=findminSum(a,n);
		cout<<s-2*m<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
